articles.author: Gaya Gupta
articles.title: Suspects in fatal Border Patrol stop had been under surveillance, authorities say - The Washington Post
articles.description: An American woman and a German man were under periodic surveillance before a shooting near the Canadian border left one suspect and one Border Patrol agent dead.
articles.content: Two suspects in a shootout that killed a U.S. Border Patrol agent in northern Vermont on Monday had been known to authorities for almost a week before the fatal traffic stop, according to court filin… [+3939 chars]
